mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (c_id, bno, pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{c_id}, #{bno}, #{pcno}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT cno, bno, ifnull(pcno, cno) as pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY pcno asc, cno asc;
